actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to reduce the "Tax on Marriage" by amending the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that a married individual who files a separate return may be taxed on his or her income at the same rate as an unmarried individual.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to tax income of married individuals filing tax returns separate from their spouses at the same rates applicable to unmarried individuals.

titles.title: A bill to reduce the "Tax on Marriage" by amending the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that a married individual who files a separate return may be taxed on his or her income at the same rate as an unmarried individual.
